headline.print_headline: Harrison Helps Pirates to DH Split With Yankees
headline.main: Harrison Helps Pirates to DH Split With Yankees

lead_paragraph: Josh Harrison homered in the seventh inning to make up for a baserunning blunder and made a diving catch in left field to help preserve the Pittsburgh Pirates' first win in the Bronx in 54 years, 5-3 over the New York Yankees on Sunday for a doubleheader split.
